heading: HB07960
0: AN ACT PROMOTING RESEARCH ON DYSTONIA
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2018-08-01
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07960
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROMOTING RESEARCH ON DYSTONIA
ABSTRACT : Seeks to provide research program for dystonia in order to provide cure, relief or prevention for this disease. Establishes a committee, to be known as the Committee on Dystonia Research, which shall ensure the strategic management, communications, and oversight of the policy formation, research, and activities of the government regarding dystonia.
ALIAS NAME : “Dystonia Research and Information Act.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SY-ALVARADO, JOSE ANTONIO "KUYA JONATHAN" R.
DATE FILED : 2018-07-25
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH ON 2018-08-01
